instruction: Convert the text into a dialogue between two characters.
input: Maria's parents were strict with her, so she started to rebel against them.
output:
Maria: "I'm so tired of my parents treating me like a child! All they do is set rules and punish me when I break them."

Parent: "We're just trying to help you make the right choices. We want you to have a good future."

Maria: "I know, but I'm old enough to make my own decisions!"
